name: NFL GameDay 2003
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

  • THE MOST AUTHENTIC GAMEDAY EVER
    • Updated Rosters, Stadiums and Past Super Bowl Teams
  • ENJOY EVERY GAME MODE IMAGINABLE
    • Training Camp, Season, General Manager and More!
  • ULTRA RESPONSIVE GAMEPLAY PUTS YOU IN CONTROL
    • Run Over Defenders and Make One Handed Grabs!
  • THE MOST ADVANCE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
    • Mix Up Your Playcalling or Failure Will Be The Result!
